ComicInfo.Summary:
Barack Obama can no longer be President because his birth certificate has been replaced by Hitler's. And the Guardians aren't too happy about having him as a member either.
After Robot and Monster Girl are trapped in another dimension, Cecil and Donald begin a major recruiting drive for the team. Elsewhere, Set is beginning a recruitment drive of his own, finding super-villains for The Order.
ComicInfo.Writer: Benito J. Cereno,Robert Kirkman,Chris Giarrusso,Benito Cereno,Chris Giarrusso,Robert Kirkman,Benito Cereno
ComicInfo.Title: Part 1
ComicInfo.Teams: Global Defense Agency,The Order,Flaxans,Guardians of the Globe
